title: Cybersecurity Law within the Healthcare Industry - Content Writing
snippet:
The expected output of this project is 1.5 – 2 single space pages of content covering the following topics:

Due to the need for collecting and retaining large swaths of data, including sensitive patient health information, the healthcare industry is heavily monitored and controlled by governments through laws and regulations. In order to fulfill these requirements, healthcare organizations must address all privacy and security needs as dictated. Please expand on this while covering the topics below:
•	Legal Issues pertaining to Information Security and Privacy for Healthcare Organizations
•	Differences between Policies, Standards, and Procedures
•	Industry Specific Laws (in the USA)
•	How Treaties such as Safe Harbor apply to Information Security and Healthcare
•	Data Breach Regulations
•	Differences between Data Owners, Controllers, Custodians, and Processors
The content must be 100% original, any plagiarism will null our contract immediately. The expectation is a 48-hour turnaround. After completion of the project, the buyer (me) will own 100% of the accepted work.
